Articles.Content:
Just four Velcro for rocket.

All rights are not protected.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/hl2jrbirdhmxe2p/Velcro.zip

Edited March 25, 2014 by GJS
Soo... do you mean that you can put flags on the side of your rocket? if so then thats cool! id like a bit more info before download though.r

Soo... do you mean that you can put flags on the side of your rocket? if so then thats cool! id like a bit more info before download though.r

Yes you are right, like stickers.
If I was to customize these for my own mission flags, how would I do so?

If I was to customize these for my own mission flags, how would I do so?

If you just want to use them for mission flags, and nothing else, I suggest that you get one of the mods that add placeable flags that you can place on stuff. FASA has some (though that is a VERY big pack), and Sirkut made a small pack purely for different sizes of surface- and stack-mountable flags.

Just askin' why it has FX and Sound FX definitions?

Edit: I have been launching a zip around here in a forum thread named Velcro, just so there are no conflicts. :3

Edited March 25, 2014 by blackheart612
These look more like stickers than the flag parts included with FASA, though if you wanted to use them for mission flags you might be able to copy the config from FASA.
You know that the next update features flags do be displayed on the parts?

You know that the next update features flags do be displayed on the parts?

But not to all the parts

You know that the next update features flags do be displayed on the parts?

They're only going to be displayed on certain parts like the command pods and the Claw... not in every part.
Cool i have been looking out for something like this for a while!
Can I put these on procedural fairings and StretchyTanks? If so then sold.

Can I put these on procedural fairings and StretchyTanks? If so then sold.

Honestly, I just checked it out on the stock parts, and it is impossible to check all the fashion, I also interested to know where they fit and where not.

This is neat - a pity it'll get outmoded in the next patch ^^; BUT ANYWAY, not to poop on your parade, I recommend calling this mod "stickers" or "decals" rather than "velcro" as "velcro" makes me think of an adhesive for attaching stuff. Also I think Velcro is a trademarked name.

Okay, MOSTLY outmoded. I s'pose it'll still be nice tacking extra stickers on things - warning labels, sponsor logos, trippy colored rectangles, yadda yadda yadda

Not even mostly. The ARM update will only allow one flag type per ship if I'm right.

Anyway. How does this work?

I recommend calling this mod "stickers" or "decals" rather than "velcro" as "velcro" makes me think of an adhesive for attaching stuff. Also I think Velcro is a trademarked name.

Yes, I came in here to see a new type of strut or connection device.... Velcro does not say " Stickers! " or " Decals! " to me.

I wonder if it's possible to make the mod so that you can use any image as a sticker just like how we use flags now?

Because i will be able then to rename the KSO shuttles independantly.

Even resize the pics in the VAB/SPH.

Edited March 28, 2014 by MK3424

Velcro - Decal Mod or something might indeed be a more descriptive title than just Velcro. How does this work. Can it be placed on every part and adapt to its shape or does it only fit a few select parts (like fuel tanks).
